issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: the 2 tests should not be checking profile.url property in the returned JSON since 'url' comes from org.apache.hadoop.mapred.JobProfile class which is marked LimitedPrivate
fields.summary: WebHCat E2E test JOBS_7 and JOBS_9 fail as profile.url in job details is being returned as null

comments.body: removed the check for url and fixed minor problems in JOBS_9

{color:red}Overall{color}: -1 no tests executed
